dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- Chris Slater
dmca.body:
NOTICE OF CRIMINAL HACKING NOTICE OF MULTIPLE CASES BANDWIDTH THEFT
NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT reference http://ilmekahwin.blogspot.com/

Mr C R Slater
49A City Road
Newcastle upon Tyne
NE12AQ England
02871430052 crs@spamcop.net

Sir, Madam,

"I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law." "I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."

The material is currently illegally clearly displayed on your servers without any given author/owner consent.

/Christopher R. Slater/
Christopher R. Slater

Material displayed as below on your servers and clearly marked on my own website at location(s) ChrisRS
